name: C-War 2
detailed_description:
C-War 2 is a cartoon-based multiplayer game. Capture flags and win the round for your team. Play with friends or with the rest of the world against others as a team. Do not leave your opponent at the flags and decide the game for your team. Get a new lvl to change skins or weapons. I hope you will enjoy my multiplayer game just as I was allowed to create it for you.

Decide which weapon to take. You can only select them at the beginning of each round.

short_description: C-War 2 is a cartoon-based multiplayer game. Capture flags and win the round for your team. Choose between different weapons and skins to decide the game for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2,7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2.7GHz NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: usefull
